description: This file is an HTML document that includes JavaScript code defining a 'Calculator' class extending 'Service', which registers remote methods 'add' and 'sub'. It also initializes a 'ServiceManager' and registers the Calculator service.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A service class that provides 'add' and 'sub' methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an array of numbers and returns a Promise resolving to the sum.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts the second parameter from the first and returns a Promise resolving to the difference.
